expected = Name('/%AA%03%E8')
number = 1000
marker = 170
self.assertEqual(Name().append(Name.Component.fromNumberWithMarker(number,
    marker)), expected,
    'fromNumberWithMarker did not create the expected component')
self.assertEqual(expected[0].toNumberWithMarker(marker), number,
    'toNumberWithMarker did not return the expected value')
